level.heading: OPERATIONAL STANDARDS[COLON] AUTHORIZED HOURS OF OPERATION (ยง 24-552)

level.text: Vendors may operate only during the following hours:
Sunday through Thursday, from 5:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.; and

Friday and Saturday from 5:00 a.m. to 1:00 a.m. the next day; provided, that vendors operating in Residential Zones, as specified in the District of Columbia Zoning Regulations, shall not vend past 10:00 p.m. on any night of the week.
Notwithstanding ยง 552.1, the Vending Site Permit for each Vending Location in a Vending Development Zone shall establish the hours of operation for that Vending Location.
